data.title: PM-KISAN Overview
eligibility_criteria: PM-KISAN: Eligibility criteria include being a farmer with land holding up to 5 acres and annual income below Rs. 6,00,000. Benefits include Rs. 6000 per year. Deadline for application is March 31, 2025.
